name: Memory of the action
description: Memory of the action (2018) combines video and performance.  Twelve people were interviewed and asked the same question: What does food mean to you? During the screening, food was served with the idea of generating a collective experience around the action of eating and as an offering for those who had shared their stories.
body:
Memory of the action (2018) combines video and performance.  Twelve people were interviewed and asked the same question: What does food mean to you? During the screening, food was served with the idea of generating a collective experience around the action of eating and as an offering for those who had shared their stories.

The work was developed during the \[Espacio en Blanco] Residence by [Fundación Proyecto 'ace](https://www.proyectoace.org/actividades/espacio-en-blanco-2/).

To watch the video click [here](https://vimeo.com/265198361).
